xldoc.title: Analyses of Analysis: Part I - Exegetical Analysis
xldoc.description: A history of logic and of the concept of logical truth
xldoc.keywords: rbjones philosophy analytic semantics meaning necessity logic metaphysics

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: First part of an analytic history of Philosophical Analysis, consisting of examples of exegetical analysis pertinent to the origins of modern methods.

secref.title: Introduction
secref.abstract: Here are some ideas about philosophers to be included in some way in the formal exegetic analysis. At this stage the only one to have made significant progress is Aristotle.
